Ok just to clarify as the post was confusing and as a
result probably why noone has replied to the end of
it.
The post starts on Tripred controlled Cybertron in the
present time of the chars of the neo beast wars. Then
to recover Shad's data tracks for restoring his body,
Primus goes back to the moment of his death and takes
components from him so that no data is lost (also a
way for me to give players an idea of his death in
case it related to any of their characters- btw nic,
Shadimus wasn't in a shuttle when he collided into the
nemesis, he was in his air attack mode). Then the post
went forward to the time of the current posts from
other characters, so anyone capable of receiving an
open Maximal commumique would have heard it over their
comms. Now that that's been cleared up, feel free to
reply to my post :P.
